title: Anglo-Norman Texts
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for book renewals for the issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.
